title: Improve bugfixing skills
body:
This pull request updates documentation and workflow instructions to improve clarity, consistency, and developer experience, with a focus on branch naming conventions, expanded build/test guidance, and enhanced bug-fixing workflows. It introduces several new reference documents for bug investigation and fixes, and clarifies the skill invocation and classification process for handling issues.

**Branch Naming and Workflow Consistency:**

- Standardizes the feature branch naming convention from `dev/issue-NNNN-description` to `copilot/issue-NNNN-description` (and similar for dependency updates) across all workflow and skill documentation, including command examples and checklists. [[1]](diffhunk://#diff-227c2c26cb2ee0ce0f46a320fc48fbcbdf21801a57f59161b1d0861e8aad55f5L66-R76) [[2]](diffhunk://#diff-05db2292a4a74ee2f53f25d3fdc69eb3749a4c1dcda9f542a63a7ebc8a3f9e98L29-R33) [[3]](diffhunk://#diff-3d0791358d8b2eb9f397cb805820bfc1182836d3b277b6aac7f29f7d249f84eaL8-R9) [[4]](diffhunk://#diff-f9c71b6da8951243004ec22339d2de5d5703f868295706fcc613bb26f17365cfL60-R68) [[5]](diffhunk://#diff-f9c71b6da8951243004ec22339d2de5d5703f868295706fcc613bb26f17365cfL145-R158) [[6]](diffhunk://#diff-f9c71b6da8951243004ec22339d2de5d5703f868295706fcc613bb26f17365cfL174-R174) [[7]](diffhunk://#diff-f9c71b6da8951243004ec22339d2de5d5703f868295706fcc613bb26f17365cfL192-R192)

**Build and Test Documentation Improvements:**

- Expands the build command matrix to include Linux (x64 and ARM64) alongside macOS and Windows, making cross-platform build instructions more comprehensive.

**Bug-Fix Workflow Enhancements:**

- Adds new reference documents for bug-fix skills:
  - Docker-based cross-platform testing guide for reproducing issues on different architectures.
  - Common fix patterns for typical bugs (null checks, memory leaks, native linking, etc.).
  - PR templates for investigation and final fixes, including how to link multiple related issues.

**Skill Invocation and Issue Classification Clarifications:**

- Refines and documents the skill invocation process, emphasizing classification based on issue content (not user request) and providing clear tables for mapping issue symptoms to skills (`bug-fix`, `add-api`, etc.). [[1]](diffhunk://#diff-227c2c26cb2ee0ce0f46a320fc48fbcbdf21801a57f59161b1d0861e8aad55f5R333-L336) [[2]](diffhunk://#diff-227c2c26cb2ee0ce0f46a320fc48fbcbdf21801a57f59161b1d0861e8aad55f5L349-R380)
- Updates the issue triage/classification section to clarify ambiguous cases and improve routing logic for different types of issues.

These changes collectively improve onboarding, reduce ambiguity, and provide better support for triaging and fixing issues in a cross-platform environment.
